text: Scott Kalvert (August 15, 1964 - March 5, 2014) was an American director, producer and writer. His best known movies are The Basketball Diaries (1995), Deuces Wild (2002) and A Very School Gyrls Holla-Day (2010). He was also a music video director for artists such as Cyndi Lauper, Snoop Doggy Dogg, DJ Jazzy Jeff & The Fresh Prince, Bobby Brown, Taylor Dayne, Deep Blue Something, Billy Ocean, Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch, LL Cool J, Samantha Fox, Eric B. & Rakim and Salt 'n' Pepa. He was born in New York City, New York. Kalvert was found dead on March 5, 2014 at his home in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California from an apparent suicide. He was 49 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Suicides in the United States Category:Writers from New York City
title: Scott Kalvert
